name: Detergent Powder
title: Sample Course
features: Powerful stain removal: Effectively removes tough stains from clothes.
High foaming action: Produces rich lather for better cleaning results.
Gentle on fabric: Does not damage or fade the colors of your clothes.
Fresh fragrance: Leaves a pleasant scent on your laundry.
Suitable for all washing machines: Works well with both top-load and front-load machines.
description: Powerful and effective, our detergent powder removes tough stains and leaves your clothes fresh and clean.

name: Detergent Liquid
title: Sample Course
features: Advanced formula: Contains powerful ingredients for deep cleaning.
Easy to dissolve: Quickly dissolves in water, ensuring no residue on clothes.
Versatile usage: Can be used for hand washing or in washing machines.
Gentle on hands: Mild on skin, preventing dryness or irritation.
Effective stain removal: Tackles stubborn stains, including grease and oil.
description: Our versatile detergent liquid delivers superior cleaning results while preserving the colors and texture of your fabrics.

name: Dish Wash Gel
title: Sample Course
features: Grease-cutting power: Easily removes tough grease and food residues from dishes.
Fast-acting formula: Provides efficient cleaning in less time.
Gentle on hands: Keeps your hands soft and smooth even after prolonged use.
Refreshing fragrance: Leaves your dishes smelling fresh and clean.
Long-lasting: A little goes a long way, making it cost-effective.
description: Cut through grease and grime effortlessly with our dish wash gel, leaving your dishes sparkling clean and residue-free.

name: Fabric Conditioner
title: Sample Course
features: Softens and freshens clothes: Makes fabric feel silky and pleasant to touch.
Reduces static cling: Minimizes static electricity, preventing clothes from sticking to each other.
Easier ironing: Smoothens out wrinkles, making ironing a breeze.
Long-lasting fragrance: Leaves a delightful scent on your garments.
Adds fabric protection: Helps preserve the quality and lifespan of your clothes.
description: Pamper your clothes with our fabric conditioner, providing a soft and long-lasting fragrance while keeping them irresistibly soft.

name: Surface Cleaner
title: Sample Course
features: Multi-surface compatibility: Suitable for various surfaces like countertops, glass, tiles, and more.
Powerful cleaning action: Effectively removes dirt, grime, and stains.
Quick-drying formula: Leaves surfaces clean and streak-free.
Antibacterial properties: Kills germs and prevents the spread of harmful bacteria.
Easy to use: Convenient spray bottle for effortless application.
description: Our surface cleaner tackles dirt and germs on various surfaces, leaving behind a spotless shine and a refreshing scent.

name: All-in-One Cleaner
title: Sample Course
features: Versatile cleaning solution: Can be used on multiple surfaces and household items.
All-round performance: Effectively cleans, disinfects, and deodorizes.
Time-saving: Eliminates the need for multiple cleaning products.
Removes tough stains: Tackles various types of stains, from grease to wine spills.
Fresh fragrance: Leaves a pleasant scent after cleaning.
description: Simplify your cleaning routine with our all-in-one cleaner, capable of tackling multiple surfaces and providing exceptional results.

name: Toilet Bowl Cleaner
title: Sample Course
features: Powerful disinfection: Eliminates germs, bacteria, and toilet bowl stains.
Extended cling time: Adheres to the bowl's surface, allowing the cleaner to work effectively.
Freshens the toilet: Leaves a clean and pleasant fragrance in the bathroom.
Easy to use: Specially designed applicator for convenient application under the rim.
Prevents limescale buildup: Helps to keep the toilet bowl clean and free from mineral deposits.
description: Maintain a hygienic bathroom with our toilet bowl cleaner, designed to remove stains, eliminate odors, and leave your toilet sparkling clean.

name: Phenyl
title: Sample Course
features: Strong and effective: Provides powerful cleaning action on floors and surfaces.
Eliminates foul odors: Helps to neutralize unpleasant smells in the environment.
Kills germs and bacteria: Provides a hygienic and clean living space.
Concentrated formula: Requires less product for effective cleaning.
Long-lasting effect: Provides a lasting freshness and cleanliness.
description: Our powerful phenyl disinfects and deodorizes floors, providing a germ-free and fresh-smelling environment in your home or workspace.

name: Soap Oil
title: Sample Course
features: Nourishing and moisturizing: Soap oil contains ingredients that help nourish and moisturize the skin, keeping it soft and hydrated.
Gentle and mild: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, as it is formulated to be gentle and non-irritating.
Deep cleansing: Soap oil effectively removes dirt, oil, and impurities from the skin, leaving it clean and refreshed.
Versatile usage: Soap oil can be used for various purposes, such as body cleansing, shaving, or as a makeup remover.
Fragrance options: Soap oil is available in a range of delightful fragrances, providing a pleasant and enjoyable bathing experience.
description: Indulge in the luxurious lather and nourishing properties of our soap oil, leaving your skin feeling moisturized, soft, and delicately scented.

name: Country Sugar
features: Our natural country sugar is handcrafted using traditional methods, retaining the genuine character and rich flavors of unrefined sugarcane, bringing an authentic taste of the countryside to your table.
With its minimally processed nature, our country sugar retains its natural molasses content, offering a distinct and delightful sweetness that complements your beverages and culinary creations.

Unlike highly refined sugars, our country sugar contains trace minerals and antioxidants, adding a touch of nutritional value to your dishes and potentially offering a more balanced sweetening option.
Whether sprinkled on top of desserts, blended into baking recipes, or stirred into beverages, our country sugar's distinct taste and texture elevate the flavors of a wide range of culinary delights.
We're committed to sustainability. Our coconut oil comes in environmentally friendly packaging, reflecting our dedication to both quality and the planet.
description: Embrace the rustic charm of our Natural Country Sugar. Handcrafted and unrefined, it brings authentic sweetness to your dishes. With its nutrient-rich profile and support for local communities, it's the perfect blend of tradition and goodness for your culinary journey.

name: Coconut Oil
features: Our coconut oil is meticulously crafted through cold-press extraction, retaining the natural goodness and aroma of coconuts while delivering a pure and unrefined oil.

From cooking to skincare, our coconut oil is a versatile solution. It's an excellent choice for high-heat cooking due to its stability, and it also serves as a nourishing moisturizer and hair conditioner.
Packed with medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs), our coconut oil offers a quick source of energy, supports metabolism, and may contribute to overall well-being when incorporated into a balanced diet.
Loaded with vitamin E, antioxidants, and lauric acid, our coconut oil enhances the nutritional value of your meals and provides potential health benefits for skin, hair, and immune support.
We're committed to sustainability. Our coconut oil comes in environmentally friendly packaging, reflecting our dedication to both quality and the planet.
description: Experience the goodness of coconuts through our Coconut Oil. Cold-pressed for maximum benefits, it's a versatile superstar – from enhancing flavors in cooking to nourishing your skin and hair. Packed with medium-chain fats, it's a wholesome addition to your well-being.

name: Groundnut Oil
features: Our groundnut oil is extracted from carefully selected, high-quality peanuts, ensuring a pure and flavorful oil that serves as a foundation for delicious and healthy cooking.
With a high smoke point, our groundnut oil is perfect for various cooking methods, from deep frying to sautéing, providing stability and preventing the breakdown of nutrients under high heat.
Rich in monounsaturated fats and low in saturated fats, our groundnut oil is known to support heart health by helping to manage cholesterol levels and promoting overall cardiovascular well-being.
Packed with vitamin E, antioxidants, and essential nutrients, our groundnut oil not only adds a delectable flavor to dishes but also contributes to a balanced diet and potential health advantages.

Whether used as a cooking medium, salad dressing, or as an ingredient in marinades, our groundnut oil's mild and pleasant taste enhances the flavors of a wide array of dishes, making it a versatile choice for any kitchen.
description: Elevate your cooking with our premium Groundnut Oil. Cold-pressed from high-quality peanuts, its high smoke point makes it ideal for diverse culinary techniques. Packed with heart-healthy nutrients, it's a tasteful and nutritious choice for every kitchen.

name: Natural Honey
features: Our natural honey is sourced from trusted apiaries, ensuring it's 100% pure and unadulterated, preserving the rich flavors and nutritional benefits of real honey.
Delight in the diverse taste of our natural honey, ranging from delicate floral notes to deep, robust flavors, making it a versatile ingredient for culinary creations.
Packed with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, our natural honey not only adds sweetness but also offers potential health benefits, contributing to your overall well-being.
We prioritize sustainable beekeeping practices, supporting bee populations and ecological balance while bringing you this delicious gift from nature.

Whether drizzled over breakfast, added to beverages, or used as a natural sweetener in recipes, our honey is a versatile pantry essential that enhances the taste and nutritional value of your favorite foods.
description: Indulge in the pure essence of nature with our Natural Honey. Sourced from trusted apiaries, it offers rich flavors and potential health benefits. A versatile pantry staple, it adds sweetness to your meals and a touch of wellness to your lifestyle.

name: Phenyl Concentrate
features: Our Phenyl Concentrate boasts an advanced formula that tackles even the toughest dirt and grime, ensuring a thorough and effective clean for various surfaces.
A little amount of this concentrate goes a long way, offering exceptional cleaning results while reducing the need for frequent refills and minimizing environmental impact.
From floors to countertops, tiles to bathrooms, our Phenyl Concentrate is suitable for a wide range of surfaces, making it a versatile solution for all your cleaning needs.
With its potent disinfecting properties, this concentrate not only cleans but also helps eliminate germs and bacteria, contributing to a healthier living environment.
Enjoy a lingering, refreshing fragrance that leaves your cleaned spaces smelling delightful, adding an extra touch of freshness to your surroundings long after cleaning.
description: Discover the ultimate cleaning solution with our Phenyl Concentrate. Its cutting-edge formula effortlessly eliminates dirt and germs, while its concentrated nature ensures long-lasting value and reduces waste. Enjoy a refreshing fragrance that lingers after each clean, transforming your spaces into inviting sanctuaries.
